name: Age of Stone
description:
Age of Stone is the newest idle game in 2018. It will take you back to a prehistoric world filled with dangers and opportunities where you can experience the purest primitive life....

【Game Features】
Epic Idle game is available now! Join us and enjoy the exciting adventure!

◆ Variety of Pets combination
There are more than 55 different primitive pets. Can you build the strongest team?

◆ Funny and coll ancient mounts with excellent appearance
Try on excellent fashion and choose pets you like to be your mount!

◆ Goddesses' bless to get special attributes
Activate the Goddesses to get resistence attributes. Help you get advantage in the competition.

◆ Unique cultivation system
Upgrade hero, cultivate pets, wear the acient equipments, equip the exclusive gems... You have a lot ways to improve your battle power.

◆ Fight with friends to become the best
Invite friends to join the clan. Share the happiness and sorrow. We believe that our clan will be the best in the game.

◆ Botting 24/7 earns you generous EXP and resources
Pleasant and relaxed game is our goal. Just enjoy it and have fun :)

【Follow us】
